name: vodka swigging pirates
description:
This is a game about communist pirates.

Someone must make a sacrifice in order to create a communist utopia, and who better than the bourgeois scum. Board their ships and steal their goods to give back to the workers!

There are four characters to choose from, each with their own unique level. They each have different weapons and speeds.

The four characters are, in the order that they appear in the select screen: Riflov, Captin, Bearovich, and Speedski.
